attributes.name: randomSeedWaves
attributes.description: Starting parameter of random number generator

attributes.name: timeIncrement
attributes.description: Time increment for time series generation

attributes.name: waveComputationMethod
attributes.description: Method parameter for computation of prescribed waves

attributes.name: waveAmplitudeComputation
attributes.description: Option for amplitude computation of waves (The phace is always stochastic)

attributes.name: numWindWaveFreqComponents
attributes.description: Wind waves: Number of frequency components in the wind wave frequency range. The min and max frequencies are determined by the actual wind wave spectrum.

attributes.name: numSwellFreqComponents
attributes.description: Swell: Number of frequency components in the swell frequency range. The min and max frequencies are determined by the actual swell spectrum

attributes.name: largePatchPoints
attributes.description: Number of points in one dimension in the large patch.

attributes.name: smallPatchPoints
attributes.description: Number of points in one dimension in the small patch.

attributes.name: patchRatio
attributes.description: Ratio between length of small patch and length of large patch.
